title: Make sharedLib in solr.xml work more like lib in solrconfig.xml
description: The various variations on the 'lib' element are very convenient. It seems logical for the same functionality to be provided for cross-core shared libs to be configured in solr.xml.

comments.author: Jan Høydahl
comments.content: Note that in the new solr.xml format which will be default in Solr4.4, there is already a <str name="lib">/my/path</str> element defined. However, I'd like it to be <lib> as in solrconfig.xml and accept multiple entries so you can have more than one sharedLib folder.
